html:
8.1.20  2:52 pm   Is your song 'We Could Just Get High' about drugs?

      i doubt it

8.1.20  2:29 pm   have you tried running for president?

      no

8.1.20  2:25 pm   What are your thoughts on tables

      it's like a chair, for objects

8.1.20  2:23 pm   Based on your last video, "might quit," I believe you are learning 3D animation. "It's the first day of school." You need to go to school for 3D animation.

     absolutely not. that makes no sense in 2020. learning is contagious, and it has caught on so far and wild, beyond the school, that schools struggle to keep up with how wild the learning now is, outside of school. also covid-19 has been pretty contagious too, so school buildings are usually not open anyway

      On a question someone asked, "Are you learning 3D animation or going to teach us about the Vietnam war?" Or something like that, you answered "One of the two." So that begs the question - are your returning to YouTube, possibly with 3D abimatoon?

      of course, but so much more

8.1.20  2:15 pm   What did you buy from the Mt. St. Helens Gift Shop? 

      some gift-shop shaped candies

8.1.20  2:03 pm   is there a thing such as "too much"

      yea that's like the best thing

8.1.20  1:47 pm   what's an example of a fun thought-experiment?

      thinking about everything at the same time

8.1.20  1:13 pm   do you like wearing t shirts on your head

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

8.1.20  12:45 pm   How did you climb the mountain?

      i made moutain climbing my entire daily routine

8.1.20  12:40 pm   Do you think i should try making a song?

      sure, but don't panic if you can't. because sometimes that's what happens the first time. unless you are..... extremely fearless

8.1.20  12:21 pm   do you use capital letters

      fuck yeah

8.1.20  11:50 am   What question do you get asked the most frequently?

      i have never been asked the same question more than once

8.1.20  11:32 am   Can we change the world?

      yes

8.1.20  11:16 am   new song soon?

      going to rain songs pretty soon. that's just common sense for me

8.1.20  10:17 am   Where do your song ideas come from?

      the gutter, if not i may check the sewer

8.1.20  9:53 am   Why are your older videos random and short?

      that was my way of learning how to make videos. so if you've ever enjoyed my longer videos, you can definitely thank the shorter ones because without those ones, the longer ones would have been completely impossible to make. in fact, that's why i didn't make videos for so many years, because i thought it was impossible, and it didn't occur to me to try short ones

8.1.20  9:33 am   Why in your history of the entire world video do you say 'I can't even get from here to there without buying a boat' but it shows a plane flying over the water?

      it felt like a boat, in that situation, because it's being used to cross the water. in truth, the thing you'd be buying is probably the plane ticket. i was using a plane ticket as a metaphor for a boat, because in that scenario its purpose is to get you across the ocean

8.1.20  9:32 am   how hard can you frolic 

      don't even get me started

8.1.20  8:21 am   thoughts on august?

      it is estimated to be longest month of the year

8.1.20  8:19 am   Are you planning on changing the website design? 

      mostly just to expand on it, gradually, as always

8.1.20  6:52 am   what's your favorite chords?

      F C G

8.1.20  6:25 am   What's the coolest thing in the entire world

      could be you

8.1.20  4:57 am   hello, do you enjoy bagels?

      yes, especially in literature

8.1.20  4:46 am   If knowing everything is unachievable as we don't even know what we could ever possibly know, how do you deal with not knowing sometimes?

     songs become extremely useful for this scenario

      Is it worth to always know as much as possible?

     it's hard to even tell what's a lot and what's a little, when there is no discernable maximum quantity

8.1.20  4:40 am   what are your opinions on buckets?

      i'm impressed

8.1.20  4:03 am   What Is Your Favorite Form Of Potato?

      trashed

8.1.20  3:57 am   do you have a political opinion on cats

      no

8.1.20  3:34 am   What about playing the 5 on the bass way ahead of the other instruments? Like in the key of C everyone is playing Dm and I am already playing a G, pushing to go there. I think it sounds great but is it annoying?

      how does the song go

8.1.20  2:59 am   what is your opinion on calculators?

      very talented

8.1.20  2:48 am   How do I learn to read?

      i would love to tell you but i'm not sure if you would be able to read it

8.1.20  2:17 am   is your shift key broken is that why you don't capitalize a lot 

      i think your statistics are off..... I capitalize more than the average person, and WAY way more than you

8.1.20  2:08 am   what is your opinion on very big saxophones?

      makes me wonder if there is a smaller saxophone inside it

8.1.20  1:29 am   Have you ever tried absurdism?

      that's preposterous. who do you think i am

8.1.20  1:06 am   do you plan on reaching Nirvana any time soon?

      every time i get close, the thing moves

8.1.20  12:32 am   Is soup a liquid or a solid?

      in its natural form, it is mush

8.1.20  12:23 am   Is it true that Antarctica has lots of punishments?

      no but they have 1 or 2

8.1.20  12:04 am   what inspires you to write songs

      it's possible for songs to inspire everything. so theoretically if you write songs you might be able to potentially inspire everything. so therefore, the power to possibly inspire everything is what inspires me to write songs





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

7.31.20  11:55 pm   WHEN IS MORE MUSIC?

      right away

7.31.20  11:23 pm   Have you ever tried existing 

      yes it's bonkers

7.31.20  11:14 pm   what do you think of satan

      never heard of it

7.31.20  11:08 pm   How do I become an extrovert?

      try a larger name tag. try to make it so big it keeps knocking into other people

7.31.20  11:03 pm   why don't you have a custom guitar to fit your colourful style

      i can't have everything

7.31.20  11:02 pm   Are you at the airport terminal?

      no

7.31.20  10:53 pm   bill, you literally emit a source of happiness, how'd you make it happen?

      using the sun and a very overly complex array of mirrors

7.31.20  10:52 pm   what's your spirit animal

      computers

7.31.20  10:20 pm   is the song "just did a bad thing" an autobiography or is it the bad thing itself

      the whole dream/scheme sections are autobiographical. the rest is more.... hypothetical

7.31.20  10:16 pm   thoughts on minimalism vs maximalism?

      it's fun to play for both teams

7.31.20  10:13 pm   what do you think of 2020

      year of Opportunity, and Promise

7.31.20  9:39 pm   how often do you write down your music on staff paper?

      since 2012 i transitioned to mostly text and audio files. when i write on staff it's usually for graphics purposes (in videos) and it's almost always done digitally via drawing tablet

7.31.20  9:03 pm   how do you achieve Clarity?

      try to listen in on a conversation between the ground and the sky
